thread.title: President's Day Sales on Amazon, Google Home, iPhone 8 | Fortune

author: Don Reisinger
title: President's Day Sales on Amazon, Google Home, iPhone 8 | Fortune
text:
By Don Reisinger 10:56 AM EST 
President’s Day is Monday, February 19. And although it’s a day off for many, it’s also an opportunity to find some nice deals on tech. 
Several retailers—including Amazon , Best Buy , and others—will offer a variety of deals on tech. Whether you’re in the market for a new smartphone or you want to pick up a new television, there are some nice deals available. Even Amazon is getting into the mix with some deals on its smart home devices. 
But rather than waste time combing through all the deals out there, read on. We’ve compiled some of the best deals in tech from a variety of sources. 
Get Data Sheet , Fortune’s technology newsletter Smartphones Best Buy is offering the iPhone 8 and iPhone 8 Plus with your option of a $150 savings or $250 Best Buy gift card. Samsung’s Galaxy S8 is available on sale at Best Buy this weekend for just $8 a month. However, you need to connect the device on Sprint’s wireless network. Looking to buy a Samsung Galaxy Note 8 ? Best Buy is selling it with a free $250 gift card. Walmart is selling Apple’s iPhone 6 for just $199, a $200 savings. Apple’s 32GB iPhone SE is on sale at Walmart for $159. Televisions Amazon is offering 10% off on several LG TVs , including some of the company’s high-end OLED sets. Pick up a Samsung UN65MU8000 65-inch TV at Amazon for $1,298. That’s down from $2,200. Over at Best Buy, you can buy a 60-inch Sharp TV for $500, a $300 savings. Best Buy is selling a 70-inch Vizio LED set featuring 4K resolution. If you’re in the market for a Samsung television, you can get the company’s 55-inch QN55Q6 at Best Buy for $1,000—$500 off its regular retail price. Smart Home Amazon is offering a $40 discount on a bundle featuring its Fire HD 10 tablet and Amazon Cloud Cam . The bundle will cost $230. Amazon’s Echo Show is available for $150, down from its regular retail price of $210. Save $50 on the Arlo Pro 2 Security System over at Best Buy. Best Buy is selling Google Home voice assistants for up to $60 off their regular retail price. Get a Google Home Mini at Best Buy for $39. It regularly retails for $49. Computers Walmart is selling the Lenovo Ideapad 320 for $229, a $40 savings. RCA’s Galileo Pro is already cheap at $180. But over at Walmart, it’ll cost $80 on President’s Day. Best Buy is selling the Apple MacBook Air for $750. It regularly retails for $1,000. HP’s Envy x360 is on sale at Best Buy for $500, down from its regular retail price of $730. Get your hands on a Dell Inspiron 2-in-1 at Best Buy for $600, a $200 savings. SPONSORED FINANCIAL CONTENT
